testcase.name: Posts endpoint accepts HTTP GET and provide all the available posts with status code as 200
Post end point returns 404 status when GET method is used
The endpoint /posts with specific ID returns the post with same ID when GET method is used
The endpoint /posts with ID greater than 100 will give 404 error
The endpoint /posts returns 500 internal server error status when HTTP POST method is used with the payload size greater than 10MB
